name: Pong-O
description:
As a chid play in the afternoon, Pong-O is a relaxing and super funny  game to play with a friend or alone.

Be the Greatest, make even more points ins this beatifull piece of art named Pong-O...

Developed to OLC CodeJam 2019, in an unprecedented partnership between Seventeen Studios and Nomad GameDev.

Thaks for playing and leave your feedback!!
